body_html: I doubt we'll working on this since we haven't seen much demand. FYI, writing custom input-processing ops is totally a valid use of TensorFlow. In this case, I'd very much encourage it since it could deliver more functionalities (necessary) and better performance (good).
body_text: I doubt we'll working on this since we haven't seen much demand.  FYI, writing custom input-processing ops is totally a valid use of TensorFlow.  In this case, I'd very much encourage it since it could deliver more functionalities (necessary) and better performance (good).
body: I doubt we'll working on this since we haven't seen much demand.  FYI, writing custom input-processing ops is totally _a_ valid use of TensorFlow.  In this case, I'd very much encourage it since it could deliver more functionalities (necessary) and better performance (good).
